content: “If you lost them in the near-by wood,” said the Fairy, “we’ll look for them and find them, for everything that is lost there is always found.”
translations: ita:— Se le hai perdute nel bosco vicino — disse la Fata — le cercheremo e le ritroveremo﹕ perché tutto quello che si perde
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Cangarejo (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
